RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 91. Claiming Purse 16300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 10 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOURBON OVER ICE with the second flight, rallied four wide through the stretch, was carried out to the seven path late and got up in the final strides. ROCK ON KITTEN trailed into the stretch, closed willingly outside in the eight path and just missed. ICON trailed from the gate, moved up steadily three wide to make the lead in upper stretch, drifted from the three path to the six path under left handed urging and was outfinished. MONTAUK COVE pressed the pace along the rail into the stretch and weakened late. THE COOKIE MAN set a pressured pace two wide to the top of the stretch and gave way late.

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Over Ice
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, rallied 4 wide, carried 7path, up in final strides

ENTRY.NAME: Rock On Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed willingly outside, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Icon
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied 3 wide, led lane, drifted 6path left urging, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Montauk Cove
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: The Cookie Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace 2 wide, gave way late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 71. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 10 Allow ed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 10 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNBRIDLED CAUSE pressed the pace two wide, dug in late under right handed urging and got up in the final strides. KID RUSSELL sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set all the pace along the inside and just missed hanging on. TIER ONE moved up four then three wide through the turn and leveled off. LOTSA MATCHA with the second flight two wide, dropped back to trail on the turn then passed tiring rivals in upper stretch. A PRAYER FOR KIDS stalked the early pace three wide and was through after a half. MA MOO POWER vied for the lead along the inside into the stretch then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Ma Moo Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Kid Russell
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace inside, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Lotsa Matcha
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, dropped back turn, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Unbridled Cause
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, long drive, just up

ENTRY.NAME: A Prayer for Kids
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Tier One
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 4-3wide, leveled off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 50. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIERNEY broke in full stride to set all the pace and widened through the stretch under left handed urging to win as much the best. VICTORIA COMMAND was bumped at the start, pressured the winner along the inside through the turn, drifted out to the four path and was no match while second best. PITY PURCHASE unhurried early, found her best stride late two wide. NATIONAL DIAMOND settled mid pack and finished well inside. PRIDE AND ATTITUDE close up four wide, angled in on the turn, improved position four wide into the stretch then was outfinished. VERTISALUTE vied for the early lead three wide and was through after a half. RIVERS RUN RED bore in bumping VICTORIA COMMAND at the start and was no threat. MAC'S CAILIN was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: National Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, finished well, inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Tierney
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, drew off, left handed urging, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Victoria Command
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed inside, drifted 4path, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Rivers Run Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Vertisalute
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Pity Purchase
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, best stride late 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Pride and Attitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 4 wide, angled in turn, improved 4wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Mac's Cailin
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 10, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 10 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE DEVIL'S DREAM away alertly, set all the pace and widened through the stretch at will to win as much the best while in hand late. NOT A WILD BRAT chased the winner and finished second best second best. CHLOES ANGEL hit the gate then bore in at the start and had a mild late rally in the six path. PSYCHOANALYST moved up three wide through the turn and into the stretch then failed to sustain that bid. ST PATTY'S SONG was no factor. GAIL'S DANCER slow early, avoided a rival in distress while along the rail late on the turn and was always outrun. SISTER'S CREED chased the winner along the inside into the turn was suffered and injury nearing the quarter pole, pulled up and was vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Chloes Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate, bore in start, late rally 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Sister's Creed
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, injured late turn, pulled up, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Gail's Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, avoided rival in distress late turn, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Psychoanalyst
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: St Patty's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: The Devil's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drew off, much the best, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: Not a Wild Brat
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 93. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 21700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 10 Al lowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WOODLAND WALK broke alertly, gave up the lead soon thereafter, prompted the pace three then two wide into the turn, took over before the quarter pole, set the balance of the pace and drew clear under mild left handed urging. OTIS OTIS OTIS pressed the early pace two wide, steadied between rivals entering the turn, shifted out at the top of the stretch then came on again in the five path to gain second. OVER THE HILLS trailed into the turn and found his best stride late in the six path. SHADOW TRACER sped to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace until late turn, remained a sharp threat into the stretch and faded late. LAUDA SPEED failed to menace. TOMATO BILL close up four wide, swung wide entering the stretch then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Shadow Tracer
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace inside, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Over the Hills
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, best stride late 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Lauda Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Otis Otis Otis
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, steadied 3/8 pole, angled out top lane, gained 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Tomato Bill
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 4 wide, swung wide, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Woodland Walk
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, pressed3-2wide, took over turn, drew clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 16600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE APRIL 10 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibil ity).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DUNVEGAN DOLL never far back, closed willingly three wide through the far turn, made the lead at the top of the stretch and finished full of run under a strong hand ride to win going away. LEWD unhurried early, swung wide, rallied in the four path and finished clear for second. GRAY ROYALITY pressed pace the pace two wide into the stretch then weakened. PURDY PUMKIN away alertly, set a pressured pace along the rail to the top of the stretch then gave way late. YEGUITA QUEEN had good early speed three wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Purdy Pumkin
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace inside, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Lewd
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, swung wide, rallied 4path, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Gray Royality
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Yeguita Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 3w, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Dunvegan Doll
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly, 3 wide, full of run, going away

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 52. Maiden Claiming Purse 13100. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAUNTER away alertly, set a pressured pace along the rail, was headed briefly before a half, regained command then widened through the stretch to win as her rider pleased. IMA SURE BET pressured the winner two wide, gained a narrow lead momentarily before a half, kept pressure into the far turn then was no match.

ENTRY.NAME: Saunter
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, drew off, as rider pleased,

ENTRY.NAME: Ima Sure Bet
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, led between calls, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 69. Allowance Purse 38400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners OfA Race S ince September 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 10 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUT MY DEAR stalked the early pace three wide, responded readily when set down under left handed urging to make the lead in deep stretch and drew off through the final sixteenth of a mile under a strong hand ride to win going away. SHAKEURSKINNYLEGS away alertly, set the pace until deep stretch then was no match for the winner. CROSSED UP never far back, finished with good courage in the six path. MIZZEN THE POINT vied for the lead along the inside into the stretch then faded. SORORITY SISTER was no factor. HIGHLY EXPLOSIVE chased the pace two wide into the stretch then weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Mizzen the Point
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Sorority Sister
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Crossed Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Highly Explosive
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Shakeurskinnylegs
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace late stretch, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Out My Dear
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3w, rallied, left handed urging, late lead, drew off,
